Source string: Use {MovementControls} and then press {BlackButton},  {WhiteButton}, or {RightFlipper} to map the selected power to that button.
Translation: Use {MovementControls} and then press {BlackButton},  {WhiteButton}, or {RightFlipper} to map the selected power to that button.

Source string: To pull out an item from your backpack, point to it with {MovementControls} and then press {AButton}. To return it to your backpack later, press {BButton}.
Translation: To pull out an item from your backpack, point to it with {MovementControls} and then press {AButton}. To return it to your backpack later, press {BButton}.

Source string: Please reconnect the controller to controller port
Translation: Please reconnect the controller to controller port

Source string: Drag {FullMouse} or use Right {Joystick} TO NAVIGATE.
Translation: Drag {FullMouse} or use Right {Joystick} TO NAVIGATE.

Source string:
You don't have enough free space to save this profile.
Press {Abutton} to continue without saving or {Bbutton} to free more space.
Translation:
You don't have enough free space to save this profile.
Press {Abutton} to continue without saving or {Bbutton} to free more space.

Source string:
You don't have enough free space to save games.
Press {Abutton} to continue without saving or {Bbutton} to free more space.
Translation:
You don't have enough free space to save games.
Press {Abutton} to continue without saving or {Bbutton} to free more space.

Source string: Saving AUTOSAVE: POINT OF NO RETURN.
Translation: Saving AUTOSAVE: POINT OF NO RETURN.

Source string: Control speed with {MovementControls} or use it to change rails when jumping.
Translation: Control speed with {MovementControls} or use it to change rails when jumping.

Source string: Use {MovementControls} or {FullMouse} to navigate the Journal.
Translation: Use {MovementControls} or {FullMouse} to navigate the Journal.

Source string: You have too many items to fit on one page! Use {DPadRight} to see the rest of your items.
Translation: You have too many items to fit on one page! Use {DPadRight} to see the rest of your items.

Source string: Raz has stowed the item in his backpack. To see what's in Raz's backpack, and what merit badges he has, press the {DPadLeft} button.
Translation: Raz has stowed the item in his backpack. To see what's in Raz's backpack, and what merit badges he has, press the {DPadLeft} button.

Source string: Type your nickname. Only letters and numbers allowed.
Translation: Type your nickname. Only letters and numbers allowed.

Source string: This save game appears to be damaged and cannot be used. Press {AButton} to continue.
Translation: This save game appears to be damaged and cannot be used. Press {AButton} to continue.

Source string: This profile appears to be damaged and cannot be used. Press {AButton} to continue.
Translation: This profile appears to be damaged and cannot be used. Press {AButton} to continue.

Source string: While you were away, your game was automatically paused.
Translation: While you were away, your game was automatically paused.

Source string: Are you sure you want to quit your game and go back to the title screen? If you haven't saved, your progress will be lost!
Translation: Are you sure you want to quit your game and go back to the title screen? If you haven't saved, your progress will be lost!

Source string: Are you sure you want to stop playing Psychonauts?
Translation: Are you sure you want to stop playing Psychonauts?

Source string: This DOWSING ROD can be used to find deeper, more valuable PSITANIUM ARROWHEADS. Equip the DOWSING ROD and watch and listen to its changing color and sound. This is how it lets you know that you are getting closer to a DEEP ARROWHEAD.
Translation: This DOWSING ROD can be used to find deeper, more valuable PSITANIUM ARROWHEADS. Equip the DOWSING ROD and watch and listen to its changing color and sound. This is how it lets you know that you are getting closer to a DEEP ARROWHEAD.

Source string: Changes to hardware acceleration will not take effect until you restart the game.
Translation: Changes to hardware acceleration will not take effect until you restart the game.
